In this paper, for d > 3, we prove the absolute continuity of the spectrum of a ddimensional periodic Dirac operator with some discontinuous magnetic and electric potentials. In particular, for d = 3, electric potentials from Zygmund classes L3 ln1+δ L(K),
δ > 0, and also ones with Coulomb singularities, with constraints on charges depending
on the magnetic potential, are admitted (here K is the fundamental domain of the period
lattice).
